sentences.sentence: Basically I will be creating the dynamic quorums of nodes based on list of active nodes and replicating the objects on different quorums.
sentences.translation: 基本上，我将根据活动节点列表创建节点的动态仲裁，并在不同仲裁上复制对象。

sentences.sentence: For the quorums of each guild to compete against each other, they regularly schedule times using the calendaring functions you've made available.
sentences.translation: 每个团体选派一定数量的成员参加比赛，他们使用您提供的日历功能安排比赛日程。

sentences.sentence: The goal of this document is to explain the two types of quorums available in Windows Server 2003 clusters - standard and majority node set (MNS) clusters.
sentences.translation: 该文件的目的在于解释视窗服务器2003串线的两种法定团体——标准的和多数串点套线(MNS)。
